name: Pain Map
description:
Provides a graphical method of surveying a participant's experience of pain by providing an easy way to indicate painful body parts as well as levels of pain. The survey participant is able to select the image representing the user's current pain level or by clicking predetermined regions in a diagram of the human body. To use this module, use the @IMAGEMAP action tag with the appropriate value in a Text Box field:

  @IMAGEMAP = PAINMAP_MALE
  @IMAGEMAP = PAINMAP_FEMALE
  @IMAGEMAP = SMILE_SCALE

See the complete documentation at https://github.com/ctsit/painmap/tree/1.0.0.
